text: Known for challenging the bravest foes to single combat, Hildr's axe bears witness to her skill, adorned with notches earned from defeating those who would question her prowess.
Hildr's voice carries across the battlefield, inspiring fear in her enemies and rallying her allies to victory.
Hildr is a master of hit-and-run tactics, striking swiftly before disappearing into the shadows, leaving confusion and chaos in her wake.
Hildr's skill with Maiden's Kiss is unmatched, her strikes swift and deadly as she cleaves through her foes.
Hildr's years of raiding have honed her tactical acumen, allowing her to outmaneuver and outsmart her foes with ease.
Hildr's voice carries across the battlefield, inspiring fear in her enemies and rallying her allies to victory.
In the heat of battle, Hildr embraces the fury of the storm, her attacks fueled by an unstoppable rage.
To combat the several sea illnesses the Norscan Reavers learn to harvest the ingredients offered by the ragged tainted cliffs of Norsca for strong potions.
Hildr is a rarity, a female reaver. She is a beauty, with long blonde hair and a feminine figure that belies her strength.
Hildr is a rarity, a female reaver. She enjoys challenging the most stalwart opponents on the battlefield to single combat.
Hildr the Reaver pledges her allegiance to your cause

As the civil war rages in Kislev, the Bjornling tribe sees an opportunity to tip the scales in their favor. Hearing tales of a legendary reaver known as Hildr, they send word for her to lead a daring raid into Kislevite territory.\\n\\n The mission is clear: plunder the lands of the White Wolf, sow chaos among their ranks, and bring back riches to bolster the Bjornling war effort. Only a warrior of unmatched skill and ferocity can lead such a daring expedition, and Hildr the Reaver is just the one for the task.\\n\\n Should she succeed in her mission, Hildr will not only secure victory for the Bjornlings but also earn her place as a fearsome leader in their ranks. The spoils of war await those brave enough to seize them, and Hildr is ready to carve her name into legend once more.
Hildr the Reaver pledges her allegiance to your cause
Men rise to her challenge, since many would be dishonoured or horribly ashamed to admit they had balked when confronted by a mere woman.

Hildr enjoys challenging the most stalwart opponents on the battlefield to single combat. Her victims rise to the challenge, since many would be dishonoured or horribly ashamed to admit they had balked when confronted by a mere woman. But the victory notches on her fearsome twin-bladed axe Maiden's Kiss count dozens of men for whom discretion would have been the better part of valour.
To combat the several sea illnesses the Norscan Reavers learn to harvest the ingredients offered by the ragged tainted cliffs of Norsca for strong potions.
